Untrained Improvisation: +4 on untrained skill checks
Archaeologist Dedication: +1 to Recall Knowledge about ancient history, peoples, and cultures
Assurance (Acrobatics): Can take an automatic 17 on Acrobatics checks
Assurance (Astronomy Lore): Can take an automatic 17 on Astronomy Lore checks
Clever Improviser: Can attempt any skill untrained
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make An Impression on one
Delay Trap: (R) Successful Thievery check delays or disables triggering trap activation; critical failure inflicts off-guard until the start of the next turn
Scholastic Identification: Can use Society to Decipher Writing and to Identify Magic with an item or location of cultural significance
Trap Finder: Gives +1 Perception and automatic Searches to find traps and allows disabling traps that require master proficiency in Thievery
Combat
Hit Points: 68 Armor Class: 19 (dexterity (4 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 20 (strength; trained)
Armor: Leather Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Bola (+10 1d6+3 B R20'; dexterity; expert); Lance (+12 1d8+3 P [Crit +d8]; strength; expert); Shield Boss (+12 1d6+3 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +10
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Fighter Weapon Mastery (Swords): Attack Master (Simple Swords; Martial Swords)/Attack Expert (Advanced Swords)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Unconventional Weaponry (Dogslicer): Weapon Familiarity (Dogslicer)
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Critical hits with a master proficiency weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Trap Finder: +1 Armor Class vs. traps
Save: Fortitude: +11 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +10 (dexterity; expert); Will: +10 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Archaeologist's Luck: (F) Rerolls a failed save vs. a trap once per hr
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the initial severity of frightened conditions is reduced by 1
Trap Finder: +1 vs. traps
Magic
Attack: Occult Innate: +10 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Occult Innate: 20 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Augury (O2): (10 min) Successful DC 6 GM flat check reveals whether the results of a proposed action up to 30 min in the future will be generally good or bad
Detect Magic (OC1): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-rank illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the level or rank of the most powerful effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the most powerful effect)
Guidance (OC1): (1) R30' Target gains +1 on an attack, Perception, save, or skill check before the start of the next turn once per target per hr
Locate (O3): (10 min) R500' Reveals the direction to a named object or the nearest object of a named type while sustained; effects are blocked by lead and running water (heightened 5th reveals the direction to a familiar creature or ancestry)
Read Aura (OC1): (1 min) R30' Reveals whether an object is magical and gives +2 to Identify Magic on it (heightened 3rd affects 10 targets; 6th affects unlimited targets)
Veil Of Privacy (O3): (10 min) Attempts to counteract detection, revelation, and scrying cast vs. touched for 8 hr
Magic Notes:
Greater Magical Scholastics: Knows the Augury, Locate, and Veil Of Privacy occult innate spells; can cast each once per day, and Veil Of Privacy target must be an object
Magical Scholastics: Knows the Detect Magic, Guidance, and Read Aura occult innate cantrips
Notes
Validation Errors:
Archaeologist's Luck Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 8 and archaeologist dedication feature (currently 1)
Class Feats Allocation: 3 available vs. 8 allocated
Delay Trap Feat: Requires rogue level >= 8, rogue dedication level >= 16 or archaeologist dedication level (currently 5) >= 10
Greater Magical Scholastics Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 10 and magical scholastics feature (currently 1)
Scholastic Identification Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 7, archaeologist dedication feature (currently 1) and society rank (currently 3) >= 3
